PISI.Name: applications.multimedia
PISI.Summary: Graphics, audio, video, CD/DVD and other multimedia applications
Grafik, ses, video, CD/DVD ve diğer çokluortam uygulamaları
Grafiken, Audio, Video, CD/DVD und weitere Multimedia-Anwendungen
>Logiciels graphiques, audio, vidéo, CD/DVD et autres
PISI.Description: In this component are various multimedia applications and services about graphics, images, video, audio and CD/DVD players.
Grafik, resim, ses ve video çokluortam uygulamaları ve CD/DVD oynatıcılar bu bölümde bulunur.
Cette composante contient divers logiciels multimédia concernant audio, vidéo, graphique et lecteurs CD/DVD.
